details:
adverb
- to the greatest extent
- to a degree (not used with a negative)
= example: to a degree (not used with a negative)
= synonyms: rather
- of an unusually noticeable or exceptional or remarkable kind, not used with a negative
= example: of an unusually noticeable or exceptional or remarkable kind, not used with a negative
- actually or truly or to an extreme
= example: actually or truly or to an extreme
